title: Embodied Mathematics Learning-Based Language Education Project

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Learners experience a creative approach integrating mathematical concepts with language learning by linking physical activities and digital tools. Collaboration and expressive skills are emphasized through team-based projects

learning_goals: Learners can express and explain numerical concepts using physical movements (speed, weight, spatial interaction)
Learners can complete 80% or more of project-based assignments applying the Laban/Bartenieff movement framework
Learners can collaborate with team members to embody mathematical ideas through physical performance and articulate them verbally/written.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
